caseTitle: Muhammad Umar Panhwar and others v. Province of Sindh and others
tagline: The Sindh Local Government Act, 2013 does not cater for a situation where a vacancy occurs on account of the demise of the Mayor, Chairman, Vice Chairman or Member of the Union Council or Union Committee and the only possibility open to the Court in such a situation is to direct the Election Commission to hold free and fair election to the said office.
